    • Booking

      public Booking(int numTickets, Flight relFlight, Customer relCustomer, double pricePer, double totPrice, double preTax, int ticklvl, int confirmation)
      When customer is passsed as a parameter this constructor is called
      Parameters:
      numTickets - number of tickets bought
      relFlight - related flight of the ticket
      relCustomer - related customer
      pricePer - price per ticket
      totPrice - total price
      ticklvl - seat type
      confirmation - confrimation number
